channel.title: Making it snow..?
channel.description:
Mkay I remember some old servers that use to have weather changes... Well I was thinking it'd be nice to spread a little christmas spirit as we count down the days until most of us get out of school, colledge, work, ect. How would I perhaps , change the weather to snowing screen? I know it's 100% possible but where would I do what :$. It might lagg so I gotta test try it though :(
-John

item.title: Making it snow..?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Gold Lord Gold
item.description:
@Lord_Gold wrote:

Sic pure your a idiot he comes here for help and you just flam him it is very possible to make a command to get the snow on players screen but sic is right it will lag the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Making it snow..?
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

  1. In your source folder go to the data folder then Weather.java
  2. Theres no Christmas spirit in it
  3. Its very annoying to players because its hard to see
  4. Great chance of it lagging your server

Read full topic
